name: Username replacer
author: Stanislav Zbarassky

sections.description: For livejournal.com, lj.rossia.org, wordpress.org, ya.ru, blogs.mail.ru, lleo.aha.ru users only. <lj user=”username”/>, <lj user=”username”>, <lj comm=”community”/>, <lj comm=”community”>, <ljr user=”username”>, <ljr comm=”community”>, <wp user=”username”>, <ya user=”username”>, <mr user=”username”>, <mr comm=”community”>, <ll user=”username”>, <hb user=”username”>, <hb comm=”community”> and <bs user=”username”> will be replaces with correct HTML code.
sections.installation:
Best way:

Use admin panel for install plugin.

Manual:

  1. Upload username-replacer.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How can I use it?

<lj user=”username”/>, <lj user=”username”>, <lj comm=”community”/>, <lj comm=”community”>, <ljr user=”username”>, <ljr comm=”community”>, <wp user=”username”>, <ya user=”username”>, <mr user=”username”>, <mr comm=”community”>, <ll user=”username”>, <hb user=”username”>, <hb comm=”community”> and <bs user=”username”> in edit mode will be replaced with correct HTML code in the posts.
sections.changelog:
0.5.1

Now you can to use ‘-‘and ‘_’ in names.

0.5

Added habrahabr.ru and blogspot.com

0.4.1

Some corrections.

0.4

Added lleo.aha.ru.
Some corrections.

0.3.1

Some corrections.

0.3

Added wordpress.org, ya.ru, blogs.mail.ru (was livejournal.com, lj.rossia.org only).

0.2.1

Some small corrections in code.

0.2

  1. Changed plugin URI.
  2. Border style ‘0pt none’ now applied to all instances.

0.1

First public release.

short_description: For popular blogengines only. Aliases for users and communities (read FAQ section) will be replaces with correct HTML code.
